name: Go Fly!
description:
I developed this game since lately I've been feeling a down and a little blase' towards game development, games, and just life in general. It's not meant to be realistic, and I don't really even have a plan for where this game is going. I just wanted a playground where I could be a kid again and fly cool airplanes around :) So if you're having a bad day or feeling a little off, I hope this game helps you like it helps me.

CONTROLS:

W/S - Pitch up/down

A/D - Roll left/right

I/K - Increase/decrease speed

J/L - Yaw left/right

(Arrow keys also work instead of WASD)

F- Smoke trail

Escape - Change airplane

Press and hold Left mouse button for free-look mode

Also, run in window since I haven't put in a quit button yet
